message.name: ERR_XRV_START_DATE_BEFORE_OFFICE_START_DATE
message.locale: The start date must not be earlier than the office start date "%1d".

message.name: ERR_XRV_START_DATE_AFTER_OFFICE_END_DATE
message.locale: The start date must not be later than the office end date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_XRV_END_DATE_AFTER_OFFICE_END_DATE
message.locale: The end date must not be later than the office end date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_DUE_TO_PRESENT_MEMBERS
message.locale: This record cannot be deleted as it has one or more dependent office members.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_DUE_TO_PRESENT_ADDRESSES
message.locale: This record cannot be deleted as it has one or more dependent office addresses.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_DUE_TO_PRESENT_PHONENUMBERS
message.locale: This record cannot be deleted as it has one or more dependent office phone numbers.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ADDRESS_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The supplied address does not exist.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PHONENUMBER_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The supplied phone number does not exist.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ONLY_ENTER_ONE_ADDRESS
message.locale: Only one address can be entered at this time. Please search for an existing address or enter a new address.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ONLY_ENTER_ONE_PHONENUMBER
message.locale: Only one phone number can be entered at this time. Please search for an existing phone number or enter a new phone number.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_MANDATORY
message.locale: An address must be entered. Please search for an existing address or enter a new address.
